snippet.title: Colonials Programme - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Colonials Programme is an upcoming indie game about colony building and resource-management. Inspired by games like Factorio, Mindustry and Anno.

Build machines and harvest the elements in a grid-based world. Produce essentials like power, food and fuel to shelter colonists or launch rockets.

Wishlist Colonials Programme on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1485630/Colonials_Programme/

Learn more by watching the gameplay preview:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bWFjYFXqXBc

Check out the animated short on Youtube:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UtO_1VxKJiE&t

Releases on 30th December 2020.
